meanings.definition: A group of singers performing together.
meanings.sent1: During the concert, the choruses sang beautifully in harmony.
meanings.sent2: The choruses in the church choir sounded angelic.
meanings.sent3: The choruses of birds outside my window woke me up with their morning song.
meanings.sent4: The choruses of laughter filled the room, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent5: The choruses of voices echoed through the auditorium, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: The part of a song that is repeated after each verse.
meanings.sent1: In the song, the catchy choruses were easy to sing along to.
meanings.sent2: The choruses of the pop song got stuck in my head all day.
meanings.sent3: The choruses of the song were so infectious that everyone started singing along.
meanings.sent4: The choruses of the anthem united the crowd in a powerful moment.
meanings.sent5: The choruses of the song brought back memories of happy times.

meanings.definition: The act of singing in a group.

meanings.sent2: Singing choruses with friends at camp was always a highlight.
